thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Desert Gold Announces Non-Brokered Private Placement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Desert Gold Announces Non-Brokered Private Placement
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Desert Gold Ventures Inc:
* DESERT GOLD ANNOUNCES NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT * DESERT GOLD VENTURES INC - ‍IT WILL CONDUCT A NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF UP TO 4 MILLION UNITS AT A PRICE OF CDN $0.25 PER UNIT​
* DESERT GOLD VENTURES INC - ‍PROCEEDS OF FINANCING WILL BE USED FOR DRILLING AND OTHER EXPLORATION ACTIVITIES AT COMPANY‘S PROJECTS IN WESTERN MALI​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
